title: Business News | I-GYAN.AI Launches Ethical, Teacher-Centric AI Platform Aligned with NEP 2020
description: Get latest articles and stories on Business at LatestLY. Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], January 2: I-GYAN.AI Solutions today announced the national rollout of I-GYAN.AI, an ethically designed, human-first artificial intelligence ecosystem created to support teachers, personalize student learning, and modernize academic and administrative operations across Indian educational institutions.

title: Fake AI chat results are spreading dangerous Mac malware - Yahoo
description: Fake AI chat results are spreading dangerous Mac malware YahooView Full coverage on Google News

title: Fake AI chat results are spreading dangerous Mac malware
description: Mac malware campaign uses fake AI chat results to deliver AMOS through terminal commands, security researchers report. Attackers exploit trust in AI-generated cleanup guides.

title: Continued Momentum in AI and Accelerated Computing Boosted Nvidia (NVDA)
